segments.text: Let's go to the animal shelter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to get a puppy for my son .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will make him so happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll get him one of those little dogs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One that won't grow up too big .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know which one he would like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , I took him there yesterday . He showed me one that he really liked .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bet you had to drag him away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He wanted to take it home yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder what he'll name it .
segments.speaker: S2
